entities

Class Ward

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Ward

  • public class Ward
extends java.lang.Object
    A ward of a hospital with a specified number of beds with consecutive labels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ward(java.lang.String wName, int wMinBedLabel, int wMaxBedLabel)
      Initialize the ward with the name given, and with beds those labels are the consecutive integers from minBedLabel to maxBedLabel.

        Initialize the ward with the name given, and with beds those labels are the consecutive integers from minBedLabel to maxBedLabel.
        Parameters:
        wName - the name of the ward
        wMinBedLabel - the label of the first bed in the ward
        wMaxBedLabel - the label of the last bed in the ward
